text: so if this is the future why are you
fighting with swords
I got into a geek fight over Twitter
with Brian Cox I tweeted something about
lightsabers and I said yeah you can make
a lightsaber they can cut through things
but if it's actually made of light they
would just pass through one another and
you wouldn't be able to get these
swashbuckling sword fights it's not like
in in ghostbusters don't cross the
streams why it would be bad
no it's you can put a flashlight in flat
and cross the beams all you want and
nothing's gonna happen then all of a
sudden Brian Cox said no wait a minute
at a high enough energy you have gamma
rays and gamma rays will actually
interact with other gamma rays and will
in fact create a force so if you want to
sort of reverse engineer what Star Wars
is doing you'd have to come back after
the fact and say the lightsabers are
made of very high-energy gamma ray beans
and then yeah you can have a sword fight
however I keep thinking if you have like
laser guns just shoot the person who I
walk up to them and have a sword fight
just shoot them from a distance and go
on your way
